Key Arguments: The submission implies that the proposed legislation gives excessive power to authorities, allowing them to determine what is considered truth without a fair appeal process.
There is a concern about the lack of checks and balances in the decision-making process regarding misinformation and disinformation.
Notable Quotes: "CITIZEN! You have spoken a mis-truth and will now be banished. Why? We said so. Appeal? Nah our word is the truth and it is final"
